faq.question: What is telemedicine?
faq.answer: Telemedicine is the use of technology to provide medical care and consultation remotely.

faq.question: How can I schedule an appointment?
faq.answer: You can schedule an appointment by contacting our telemedicine service through the chatbot or by calling our support line.

faq.question: What types of services are offered?
faq.answer: We offer a variety of services including virtual consultations, follow-up appointments, and health information resources.

faq.question: Is telemedicine safe?
faq.answer: Yes, telemedicine is safe and secure. We use encrypted communication to protect your personal health information.

faq.question: What do I need for a telemedicine appointment?
faq.answer: You will need a device with internet access, a webcam, and a quiet space for your consultation.

faq.question: Can I get prescriptions through telemedicine?
faq.answer: Yes, our healthcare providers can prescribe medications during your telemedicine appointment if necessary.

faq.question: What if I have technical issues during my appointment?
faq.answer: If you experience technical issues, please contact our support team for assistance.
